REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0357 reute u f BC-CHINA-TRADE-DEFICIT-F 03-12 0056

TEXT.TITLE: CHINA TRADE DEFICIT FALLS IN JANUARY
TEXT.BODY: China's trade deficit in January fell to 310 mln dlrs from 460 mln in January 1986, the China Daily Business Weekly said. Quoting customs figures, the paper said exports fell to 1.75 billion dlrs from 1.84 billion and imports fell to 2.06 billion from 2.3 billion. REUTER
